page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content: The school was built in March 1969 .At that time there 400 hundred children in the school.A year after the school first 2 extra rooms were added.To stay for dinner cost 12.5p but now it is 60p.The largest number of classrooms there has ever been is ten but there are 8 rooms now. There are ten teachers two of the teachers that were there when the school was first built are still here they are Mrs Howling and Mr Walker,who has been headmaster in different schools for 28 years. He spends Â£3,500 at least in our school a year.There are 230 children in our school and 80 children in the nursery. Sharon Sturrock Tina Galloway
